metadata.title: CVE-2022-48654 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nfnetlink_osf: fix possible bogus match in nf_osf_find()nf_osf_find() incorrectly returns true on mismatch, this leads to copyinguninitialized memory area in nft_osf which can be used to leak stale kernelstack data to userspace.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
